name: PIGNESS [Multi Language]
description:
Ghosts in the cave and money on the ground. PIGGY 🐷 needs your help!

Collect as many coins 🪙 as possible before time runs out! But be careful... they are lurking in the dark...👻

How can you help Piggy you ask? Well, here is how to control him:

  • You can move Piggy wherever you want just by clicking where you want him to go.
  • You can make him run by pressing the "run" button (yeah, simple, I know). It makes him go faster but his vision will be narrowed so be careful...
  • You can make him walk once again by pressing the "walk button (indeed Sherlock!). He'll move way slower but at least, he'll be able to see coins far away!

How long can you last??? 🕐
